summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating electrical wiring and equipment amending Sections 4.100.6, 4.210.5, 4.210.8, 4.210.23, 4.210.26, 4.220.4, 4.230.4, 4.230.42, 4.230.70, 4.250.74, 4.300.1, 4.310.10, 4.346.2, 4.430.36, 4.430.37, 4.511.4 and 4.900.2 of the Electrical Code (Ordinance 93229) AND adding new Sections 4.230.28, 4.348.3 and 4.373.12 thereto.
